resources.string:
"Welcome to Lain, this info only shows when you have not downloaded any model.
**Download Model**
You need to download a model to start using. Click the **Settings** button on the top bar, select a model, and wait for the system to complete the download. You can check the download progress in the notification bar. 
After the download is complete, please click the **Use** button and then return here to start chatting immediately.
**Guide**
- Click the share button to export and share the conversation content.
- To clear the conversation, **tap** the refresh button "↻". This will not reload the current model.
- **Long press** the refresh button "↻" to force reload the model or exit the app and reopen it.
It is very important to choose a suitable model file. We recommend starting with the smallest model for faster performance on your phone. Need suggestions? You can start chatting with Qwen 1.8B or Gemma 2B. "
How can I assist you today?
Failed to load model %s. Trying to re-download this model.
这些模型是 Q4 i8mm 量化模型 (Q4_0_4_8)，您的处理器支持 i8mm 指令集，使用这些模型速度最快。
这些模型是 Q4 量化的 ARM NEON 模型，为大部分 ARM 处理器提供了更快的速度。
